verbs.description: iva peach cobbler [ARG0: my mother] [V: received] [ARG1: this peach cobbler recipe] [ARG2: from a friend of hers] [ARGM-TMP: many years ago] and fortunately she shared it with me boise is situated right between two large fruit - producing areas in our state so peaches are plentiful in the summer —ruby ewart boise idaho cobbler iva
